Infinity Embedding Model

This is the stable default model for infinity. More details about the infinity inference project please refer to the Github: Infinity. ## Usage for Embedding Model via infinity in Python To deploy files with the infinity_emb pip package. Recommended is with flash attention on gpu, and for onnx inference. ## CLI interface The same args ## Contact If you have any question or suggestion related to this project, feel free to open an issue or pull request. You also can email Michael Feil (infinity at michaelfeil.eu). ## Citation If you find this repository useful, please consider giving a star :star: and citation ## License Infinity is licensed under the MIT License.
model_explanation_gemini: Generates sentence embeddings for English text to measure similarity and extract features.
